channel.title: 508 HD client doesen't work on HD source
channel.description:
Alright i got the Davidscape 508 source, it says its HD on the post, and there is an HD and LD client download on the post to, but whenever i run the server, and try to log on using the HD client the server says: Connection received from: 127.0.0.1 But i don't Actually go past the:"Connection to update server" loading... also with another HD client witch is full screen, it completes the loading but hen i change the server to my server and try to log in it says error connecting to server... Yes i have titana cache, and i've put the cache085 file in the titana cache folder on:C:\Windows\.titana_cache Yes I've tried another source, witch is ONLY HD (i think, since i couldn't connect using LD)
Sure the server works in LD, but if i wanted it to be LD then i would make a 317 server, please help.

item.title: 508 HD client doesen't work on HD source
item.dc:creator: @cool_dred cool dred
item.description:
@cool_dred wrote:

Alright i got the Davidscape 508 source, it says its HD on the post, and there is an HD and LD client download on the post to, but whenever i run the server, and try to log on using the HD client the server says:
Connection received from: 127.0.0.1
But i don’t Actually go past the:“Connection to update server” loading…
also with another HD client witch is full screen, it completes the loading but hen i change the server to my server and try to log in it says error connecting to server…
Yes i have titana cache, and i’ve put the cache085 file in the titana cache folder on:C:\Windows.titana_cache
Yes I’ve tried another source, witch is ONLY HD (i think, since i couldn’t connect using LD)

Sure the server works in LD, but if i wanted it to be LD then i would make a 317 server, please help.

Read full topic
